datamismatch.parsingerrortitle: There was an error while parsing new data.
datamismatch.parsingerrordesc: You can load the new data and try to fix the error or return to the data previously loaded.
datamismatch.missingcolumntitle: The data mapping of this project requires the dimension
datamismatch.missingcolumntitle2: that we can't find in the new data.
datamismatch.missingcolumndesc: You can create a new data mapping with the new data or return to the data previously loaded.
datamismatch.typemismatchtitle: The data-types previously set for this project can't be applied to the new data.
datamismatch.typemismatchdesc: You can use the new data and re-set data-types or return to the data previously loaded.
